data.introduce: 国内航段运价计算(AirPriceBySeg)服务可根据航段信息组获得独立于PNR的运价计算信息。
data.business: 国内单程、联程以及缺口程的所有乘客类型的运价计算。
data.functions:
本版本支持的航段pat:a业务场景如下：
单人+成人
单人+儿童
单人+军残
单人+因公带伤警察
单人+婴儿
联程+成人
联程+儿童
联程+军残
联程+因公带伤警察
联程+婴儿
缺口程+成人
缺口程+儿童
缺口程+婴儿
缺口程+军残
缺口程+因公带伤警察
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"OTA_AirPriceRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空运价计算请求信息","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Point Of Sale","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"RequestorID","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"请求者代码","children":[{"name":"CompanyName","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"航空公司","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"大客户编码","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"@CityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"营业部所属城市：默认为Office前三位","children":[]},{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Office号：Pat:A和校验所用Office号","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Option","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"属性，支持A和M","children":[]},{"name":"AirItinerary","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"行程信息集合","children":[{"name":"OriginDestinationOptions","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出发到达地 信息集合","children":[{"name":"OriginDestinationOption","type":"array","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"出发到达 信息：出发到达信息项，必输项，最少1个","children":[{"name":"FlightSegment","type":"array","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"航段信息：航段信息，支持联程","children":[{"name":"OperatingAirline","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"共享航班信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司代码（例如：MU）","children":[]},{"name":"@FlightNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航班号：如：1831","children":[]}]},{"name":"DepartureAirport","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出发地信息","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"到达地三字码：例如：SHA","children":[]}]},{"name":"ArrivalAirport","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"到达地信息","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"机场代码（例如：SHA）","children":[]}]},{"name":"Equipment","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"机型信息","children":[{"name":"@AirEquipType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"机型：例如：773","children":[]}]},{"name":"BookingClassAvail","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"舱位信息","children":[{"name":"@ResBookDesigCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"舱位代码","children":[]},{"name":"SubClass","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"子舱","children":[]}]},{"name":"@RPH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"标识","children":[]},{"name":"@DepartureDateTime","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出发日期和时间：格式如：2013-05-29T07:30:00","children":[]},{"name":"@ArrivalDateTime","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"到达日期和时间：格式如：2013-05-29T09:30:00","children":[]},{"name":"@FlightNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航司两字码+航班号：格式如：CA1831","children":[]},{"name":"@Status","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"行动代码：即航段状态，如：HK","children":[]},{"name":"@FareBasisCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"指运价基础代码","children":[]}]}]}]}]},{"name":"TravelerInfoSummary","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客信息","children":[{"name":"AirTravelerAvail","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客信息，指定旅客类型、数量等","children":[{"name":"PassengerTypeQuantity","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"乘客类型、数量信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"乘客类型代码","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"PriceRequestInformation","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"@CurrencyCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"货币代码：例如：CNY、HKD、MOP","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"BookingReferenceID","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"PNR号信息","children":[{"name":"CompanyName","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"公司信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"大客户编码","children":[]},{"name":"@AccountCodeFaresOnly","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否只返回大客户运价","children":[]}]}]}]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"OTA_AirPriceRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空运价计算响应信息","children":[{"name":"Warnings","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"至多1个","children":[{"name":"Warning","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"可输出多个","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误详细描述或者内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"编码","children":[]},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司两字码：如：CA","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告 详细信息","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告描述信息(中文)","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"PricedItineraries","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"？价格信息：？至多1个","children":[{"name":"PricedItinerary","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"运价行程信息","children":[{"name":"AirItineraryPricingInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"运价信息","children":[{"name":"ItinTotalFare","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"总价信息列表：舱位价格+税费","children":[{"name":"FareInfoRef","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"对应的价格信息","children":[{"name":"@RPH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"编号：价格信息编号","children":[]}]},{"name":"BaseFare","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"总价格","children":[{"name":"@Amount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"税费金额：格式为0.0","children":[]}]},{"name":"Taxes","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"税费信息","children":[{"name":"Tax","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"可能无税费，例如婴儿票","children":[{"name":"@TaxCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"税费代码：CN：基建费 YQ：燃油税","children":[]},{"name":"@Amount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"数额","children":[]},{"name":"@CurrencyCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"货币代码","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Remark","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"备注信息：FC/FN/FP信息，例如： FC/PEK A-09MAY14 F-03KG CA SHA 1500.00Y CNY1500.00END FN/FCNY1500.00/SCNY1500.00/C3.00/TCNY30.00CN/TCNY20.00YQ FP/CASH,CNY","children":[]},{"name":"RmkCms","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"固定代理费","children":[]},{"name":"@ZValue","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Z值","children":[]}]},{"name":"FareInfos","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"舱位价格信息列表","children":[{"name":"FareInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"舱位价格","children":[{"name":"MarketingAirline","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航空公司","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司代码（例如：CA）","children":[]}]},{"name":"DepartureAirport","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"出发地信息","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"到达地三字码：例如：SHA","children":[]}]},{"name":"ArrivalAirport","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"到达地信息","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"机场代码（例如：SHA）","children":[]}]},{"name":"FareBasisCodes","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"运价基础信息集合","children":[{"name":"FareBasisCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"运价基础信息代码","children":[]}]},{"name":"Rule","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"运价规则","children":[{"name":"tag","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"标签","children":[{"name":"tagCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"标签代码","children":[]},{"name":"tagSubInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"标签子信息","children":[{"name":"tagSubInfoCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"标签子信息代码","children":[]},{"name":"tagSubInfoValue","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"标签子信息值","children":[]}]}]}]},{"name":"RuleID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价规则ID","children":[]},{"name":"Baggage","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"记录行李额和单位：例如： 20KGpd","children":[]},{"name":"@RPH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"标识","children":[]},{"name":"@Amount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"数额","children":[]},{"name":"@FareType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价类型：0:公布价单端相加；1:国航中转；2:其它航空公司中转；3:全程匹配价；4:组合价；5:拆分价","children":[]}]}]}]}]}]},{"name":"PATMFormattedResult","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"FCText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Fc信息","children":[]},{"name":"FNtext","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Fn信息","children":[]},{"name":"FPText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Fp信息","children":[]},{"name":"EIText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Ei信息","children":[]},{"name":"TCText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Tc信息","children":[]}]},{"name":"TASKID","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"@ID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"taskID信息","children":[]}]},{"name":"Errors","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"？错误信息：至多1个","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误详细描述或者内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"编码","children":[]},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误代码(数字)","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息(英文)","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息(中文)","children":[]}]}]}]}]
data.errorCodes: [{"code":" 403 ","name":null,"msg":null,"msgZh":" 用户名、密码、IP错误或无权限 "},{"code":" -303 ","name":null,"msg":" 内部服务异常 ","msgZh":" 将xml转换成类对象异常 "},{"code":" -301 ","name":null,"msg":" office prermission denied ","msgZh":" 没有office权限 "},{"code":" -306 ","name":null,"msg":" too many concurrent request for service ","msgZh":" 访问频率限制 "},{"code":" -400 ","name":null,"msg":" Format of xml string is not valid! ","msgZh":" 输入的请求XML格式无效 "},{"code":" -402 ","name":null,"msg":" Input error! ","msgZh":" 输入错误 "},{"code":" -403 ","name":null,"msg":" Forbidden ","msgZh":" 接口未授权 "},{"code":" -500 ","name":null,"msg":" Office code is empty ","msgZh":" office代码为空 "},{"code":" -510 ","name":null,"msg":" departure datetime is empty ","msgZh":" 出发日期时间为空 "},{"code":" -511 ","name":null,"msg":" arrival datetime is empty ","msgZh":" 到达日期时间为空 "},{"code":" -520 ","name":null,"msg":" departure location code is empty ","msgZh":" 出发地代码为空 "},{"code":" -521 ","name":null,"msg":" arrival location code is empty ","msgZh":" 到达地代码为空 "},{"code":" -541 ","name":null,"msg":" flight number is empty ","msgZh":" 航班号为空 "},{"code":" -542 ","name":null,"msg":" flight class is empty ","msgZh":" 舱位代码为空 "},{"code":" -551 ","name":null,"msg":" action code is empty ","msgZh":" 行动代码为空 "},{"code":" -552 ","name":null,"msg":" equipment type is empty ","msgZh":" 机型信息为空 "},{"code":" -10000 ","name":null,"msg":" response is empty ","msgZh":" 返回信息为空 "},{"code":" -10050 ","name":null,"msg":" there is no fare information found ","msgZh":" 找不到运价信息 "},{"code":" -34001 ","name":null,"msg":" segment information is empty ","msgZh":" 航段信息为空 "},{"code":" -34200 ","name":null,"msg":" Pricing system unable to process ","msgZh":" 运价计算后台系统处理异常 "}]

qaApiDemos.request:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<OTA_AirPriceRQ>
    <POS>
        <Source CityCode="BJS" PseudoCityCode="BJS407">
            <RequestorID>
                <CompanyName Code="CA" />
            </RequestorID>
        </Source>
    </POS>
    <AirItinerary>
        <OriginDestinationOptions>
            <OriginDestinationOption>
                <FlightSegment Status="HK" DepartureDateTime="2013-09-25T07:30:00" ArrivalDateTime="2013-09-25T09:30:00" FlightNumber="CA1831">
                    <DepartureAirport LocationCode="PEK" />
                    <ArrivalAirport LocationCode="SHA" />
                    <Equipment AirEquipType="773" />
                    <BookingClassAvail ResBookDesigCode="Y" />
                </FlightSegment>
            </OriginDestinationOption>
        </OriginDestinationOptions>
    </AirItinerary>
    <TravelerInfoSummary>
        <AirTravelerAvail>
            <PassengerTypeQuantity Code="ADT" />
        </AirTravelerAvail>
    </TravelerInfoSummary>
</OTA_AirPriceRQ>

					<Remark>

FN/FCNY1500.00/SCNY1500.00/C3.00/TCNY30.00CN/TCNY20.00YQ
FP/CASH,CNY</Text>

						<Text>FC/PEK A-10MAY14 F-03KG CA SHA 980.00NETFARE/FBR CNY980.00END
FN/FCNY980.00/SCNY980.00/C3.00/TCNY30.00CN/TCNY20.00YQ
FP/CASH,CNY</Text>
					</Remark>
                       <RmkCms>RMK CMS/100.00//100.00</RmkCms>
				</ItinTotalFare>
				<ItinTotalFare ZValue="3.0">
					<FareInfoRef RPH="2_0"/>
					<BaseFare Amount="1130.0"/>
					<Taxes>
						<Tax TaxCode="CN" Amount="30.0" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
						<Tax TaxCode="YQ" Amount="20.0" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
					</Taxes>

FN/FCNY1130.00/SCNY1130.00/C3.00/TCNY30.00CN/TCNY20.00YQ
FP/CASH,CNY</Text>
					</Remark>
				</ItinTotalFare>
				<FareInfos>

qaApiDemos.request:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<OTA_AirPriceRQ>
    <POS>
        <!--CityCode:营业部所属城市，PseudoCityCode：OFFICE号  -->
        <Source CityCode="BJS" PseudoCityCode="BJS407">
            <RequestorID>
                <!-- 航空公司两字码 -->
                <CompanyName Code="CA" />
            </RequestorID>
        </Source>
    </POS>
    <AirItinerary>
        <OriginDestinationOptions>
            <OriginDestinationOption>
                <!-- Status:行动代码， DepartureDateTime：出发时间（注意格式，此格式方便后面转换）
					 ArrivalDateTime:到达时间，FlightNumber：航班号
				-->
                <FlightSegment Status="HK" DepartureDateTime="2013-09-25T07:30:00" ArrivalDateTime="2013-09-25T09:30:00" FlightNumber="CA1831">
                    <!-- 出发城市 -->
                    <DepartureAirport LocationCode="PEK" />
                    <!-- 到达城市 -->
                    <ArrivalAirport LocationCode="SHA" />
                    <!-- 机型 -->
                    <Equipment AirEquipType="773" />
                    <!-- 舱位 -->
                    <BookingClassAvail ResBookDesigCode="Y" />
                </FlightSegment>
            </OriginDestinationOption>
        </OriginDestinationOptions>
    </AirItinerary>
    <TravelerInfoSummary>
        <AirTravelerAvail>
            <!-- 旅客类型 -->
            <PassengerTypeQuantity Code="INF" />
        </AirTravelerAvail>
    </TravelerInfoSummary>
</OTA_AirPriceRQ>
qaApiDemos.response:
<OTA_AirPriceRS>
	<PricedItineraries>
		<PricedItinerary>
			<AirItineraryPricingInfo>
				<ItinTotalFare ZValue="0.0">
					<FareInfoRef RPH="0_0"/>
					<BaseFare Amount="150.0"/>
					<Taxes>
						<Tax TaxCode="CN" Amount="0.0" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
						<Tax TaxCode="YQ" Amount="0.0" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
					</Taxes>
					<Remark>
						<Text>FC/IN/PEK A-10MAY14 F-20KG CA SHA 150.00YIN10 CNY150.00END/TEXT/*(IN)
FN/IN/FCNY150.00/SCNY150.00/C0.00/TEXEMPTCN/TEXEMPTYQ
FP/IN/CASH,CNY</Text>
					</Remark>
				</ItinTotalFare>
				<FareInfos>
					<FareInfo RPH="0_0" Amount="150.0">
						<MarketingAirline Code="CA"/>
						<DepartureAirport LocationCode="PEK"/>
						<ArrivalAirport LocationCode="SHA"/>
						<FareBasisCodes>
							<FareBasisCode>YIN10</FareBasisCode>
						</FareBasisCodes>
					</FareInfo>
				</FareInfos>
			</AirItineraryPricingInfo>
		</PricedItinerary>
	</PricedItineraries>
</OTA_AirPriceRS>

qaApiDemos.request:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<OTA_AirPriceRQ>
    <POS>
        <!--CityCode:营业部所属城市，PseudoCityCode：OFFICE号  -->
        <Source CityCode="PEK" PseudoCityCode="PEK099">

					 ArrivalDateTime:到达时间，FlightNumber：航班号
				-->

                    <!-- 出发城市 -->

                    <!-- 到达城市 -->
                    <ArrivalAirport LocationCode="DLC" />
                    <!-- 机型 -->

                    <!-- 舱位 -->
